content.description: A Crossfader Plugin to nicely mix your track. On install it tweaks MPD to allow crossfade but you must activate software mixer to get it properly working...Take also a look at the help section to get more context

sections.label: Configuration
sections.description: To allow crossfading you must set a crossfade time >0, you can also adjust optional mixramp settings

saveButton.label: Save
saveButton.description: Clic Save to apply and launch MPC command
